name: Element Blaster
description:
Element Blaster

Use your twin-chamber Elemental Blaster to combine elements into deadly force!! What's stronger than fire? Twice the fire!! defeat all the foes in the area to reach the next level...

Part of Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Credits:

Programming: Spejz

Music & sound: bradymuthmusic

Art: Tato
